data.scheme_name: Madhya Pradesh Renewable Energy Policy - 2022 - Incentives for RE developers - Reimbursement of Stamp Duty -  Existing
data.benefits: The scheme provides a 50% reimbursement on stamp duty for the purchase of private land.
data.eligibility: Renewable Energy Technology based power projects of capacity equal to or more than 500 kW and registered with NRED are eligible under the scheme.
data.conditions: Benefit can be avail on purchase of private land only by developers.
data.beneficiaries: Renewable Energy Technology based power projects of capacity equal to or more than 500 kW and registered with NRED are eligible under the scheme.
data.prerequisites: Benefit can be avail on purchase of private land only by developers.
data.nodal_agency: Office of the Commissioner, New and Renewable Energy, GoMP
data.context: The main purpose of this scheme is to harness the stateâ€™s renewable energy potential, mitigate climate change impacts, and promote sustainable power generation.
data.objective: The objective is to make the state a renewable energy hub by developing RE manufacturing, promoting large-scale adoption, and advancing innovative technologies for reliable, cost-effective power.
data.description: The scheme provides a 50% reimbursement on stamp duty for the purchase of private land.
data.how_to_apply: Applicant can apply by registering itself with New and Renewable Energy
data.funding_facilitator: New and Renewable Energy Department, Government of Madhya Pradesh
data.funding_mechanism: Fund/Incentive will be released on approval of application by the concerned authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
Registration certificate/Incorporation proof 
Partnership deed, in case of partnership firm 
Copy of Bye Laws of Society/Co-operative Society along with list of members 
In case of individual, declaration on non-judicial stamp paper of relevant value, duly notarized, to the effect that he is applying for the project as a sole proprietary 
Enclose attested copy of Power of Attorney as per applicable Format
data.checklist_info_c:
The applicant can apply by registing it's self on by nodel agency.
https://rumsl.mp.gov.in/wp-content/uploads/government_policy/2022/08/English-RE-guidelines.pdf
